synopsis.text:
November and December bring exciting additions to Hiromu Arakawa's acclaimed manga series, Arslan Senki, with two new OVAs bundled in the fifth and sixth volumes. The first OVA, slated for release on May 9, features an original storyline crafted under Arakawa's watchful eye. In this comedic tale set amidst the chaos of war, Arslan receives a lesson in love from Gieve, while the romantic escapades of Daryun, Narsus, and a certain hero are brought to light.

The second OVA, scheduled for release on December 9, is titled "The Road of Blood and Love." In this episode, Arslan finds himself in Gieve's company, prompting the latter to share intriguing tales of Narsus, Daryun, and Elam's past romantic endeavors. The episode concludes with Arslan and his companions preparing to depart from Shindra, following the battle between Rajendra and Gadevi. Before they leave, they decide to spend some time at the castle, setting the stage for the "Banquet of Friendship."

In this two-part OVA series, Arslan Senki fans can look forward to a delightful blend of comedy, romance, and camaraderie, all unfolding against the backdrop of war.
